This CV is from June 2018: to see recent publications, go to [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?hl=en&user=vpjEkQwAAAAJ&view_op=list_works&sortby=pubdate).
You may also download a PDF from [here](https://bomeara.github.io/webmaterial/OMearaCV.pdf). The CV is generated using information from [Orcid](http://orcid.org/0000-0002-0337-5997), [ImpactStory](https://impactstory.org/u/0000-0002-0337-5997), [GitHub](https://github.com/bomeara), and [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=vpjEkQwAAAAJ&hl=en). The code used to generate this is freely available [here](https://github.com/bomeara/cv), though it has to be updated to deal with Orcid's recent API changes.
